text: Solution : Â© If rank of a matrix is less than size of matrix, then determinant of matrix is zero. So, S; is true. If 7 is size of matrix and 7 is rank, then number of zero eigen value is 1 - 7. So, here 3 - 2 = 1 is 0 eigen value. So, S, is correct. trace (A) = X(eigen values of A) = 3(sum of non-zero eigen values) trace (A) = 1+4+3=8 So, S, is incorrect.
